title: Hello there, I’m Oliver!
text:
I’m Oliver F. Anderson, a Data Scientist and Health and Fitness Nerd. Get to know me better.
Take a look around and check out some of the projects that I have been working on.
          
Photo by Xue Guangjian

title: About Me
text:
My name is Oliver Faulkner Anderson and I am passionate about living a healthy and fulfilling life. I am a data scientist currently pursuing my Master's of Data Science at Willamette University. I did my undergraduate at Willamette University where I studied Biology with a minor in Chemistry.
  

I am a big sports science and nutrition nerd and I found an outlet for these passions while competing in Track & Field as a jumper and sprinter at Willamette.





Photo by Kendrick Arakaki/Willamette University




I presented my thesis at the Murdock College Science Research Conference where I developed a pipeline for cleaning and processing data gathered by RNA sequencing. This work was later published in the Internation Journal of Molecular Sciences in collaboration with Reed College. If you would like to find out more about this project, you can check it out along with my other projects here.

title: Projects
text:
Development of a Pipeline for Wrangling RNA Seq Data





Development of a software pipeline for cleaning and processing data from RNA sequencing.
